article.title: September 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The September 2013 Galaxy Update is hot off the press:

Highlights:

  • A record five new public servers
  • 30 new papers
  • Take the 2014 Galaxy Training Survey
  • Open Positions at six different organizations
  • Upcoming Events including training in California, Sydney, Italy, Toulouse, and Boston.
  • Aug 12, 2013 Galaxy Distribution
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the next Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
